product_name: Liberty Bottleworks NYC Transit Bottle with Sport Top - 24 fl. oz.
long_description: Hop on a bus or catch a subway train across town and quench your thirst along the way with a sip of cool water from the Liberty Bottleworks NYC Transit water bottle with Sport Top. Made in the United States from 100% recycled aluminum; all materials used are 100% BPA free. Just flip the valve up, tip the bottle and sip, or remove the cap entirely and drink straight from the bottle. Food-grade silicone O-ring in the cap limits leaks. Food-grade polyester powder coat on the inside of the bottle is BPA free. Liberty Bottleworks NYC Transit water bottle with Sport Top holds 24 fl. oz. Hand washing recommended.
short_description: Hop on a bus or catch a subway train across town and quench your thirst along the way with a sip of cool water from the Liberty Bottleworks NYC Transit water bottle with Sport Top.
